story.title: My Confidant - Episode 5
story.storyDescription: When Lucy hears a stranger break into her apartment, she texts her long-distance boyfriend, Brendan. Too bad there’s nothing he can do to save her…
story.creator: web-uploader

messages.text: Hello. My name is Dr. Claire Carnwright. Can you please verify that this is Lucy Jane McMillan?
It is.
Thank you. Can you please supply your father’s middle name, the street name on which you grew up, and the town in which you were born?
Umm, I’m sorry, but I’m not comfortable doing that
What kind of doctor are you?
And how do I know you’re who you say you are?
Plus, I’m kinda having a rough night
I know you are, and so does my team. We know you were abducted from your home at 4234 W Davison, Apt 2F, Detroit, MI. We would like to help.
I can sense your hesitancy. Does it help to know that I’m with the FBI? I’ll attach my identification.
Dr. Carnwright texts a photo of her ID.
That helps a little
But the thing is, I don’t know who to trust right now.
I understand.
I’ve just been given permission to tell you why I’m contacting you if you supply only one of those aforementioned identifiers.
You may send a picture for face recognition instead.
OK. I’d rather answer--I grew up on Cranberry Lane
Thank you. 221 Cranberry Lane, Charleston, VT, correct?
Whoa… yeah.
That information was supplied by my team at the FBI. I have been instructed to tell you that your roommate, Chistopher Slouth is under an extensive investigation.
What?!
Yes. He’s a major arms dealer in the city of Detroit. We have tracked the gun that killed Congressman Gross, and found that it was sold at 4234 W Davison, Apt 2F by a Mr. Christopher Slouth.
Topher?!
Yes. After further investigation, we’ve discovered that his illegal activities have accounted for almost 100 guns sold and purchased on the black market.
Lucy, I’m sorry to be the one to deliver the news in such a curt manner, but we need to act quickly.
It is our understanding that Christopher Slouth arranged for your abduction to hold you for ransom, since your family and boyfriend have considerable wealth.
WHAT?! This is insane.
I know this may be shocking for you to hear.
Our team has ascertained that Christopher was cornered on his walk to school a few months ago. He was forced into the business, but when it became lucrative, he assumed operations himself.
Holy shit!
Sorry, it just doesn’t sound like Topher.
I know. But Miss McMillan? You are in danger.
Christopher went through extensive lengths for your capture.
He hired someone to break into your apartment…
He hired actors in falsified police uniforms in case you’d managed to escape your apartment.
And when you were isolated in a falsified cop car, he had the actors bring down a stuffed bodybag.
Oh my god!
That’s SO messed up.
TOPHER did all that? To me?
Yes. Miss McMillan, I’d like to send in my team to remove you from the cell right away.
OK, yeah
May we locate your cellphone on our security grids?
Yeah, absolutely.
Thanks.
You have been located. My team will arrive shortly. I will be with them, so you’ll know we’re the people you can trust.
My God—thank you
You… you saved my life.
It is our honor to serve.
Lucy clicks on the text message conversation between her and Brendan.
37 minutes later

Luce? I’m sorry to text. I know that you don’t want me to, but it’s been over 35 minutes and I needed to check in. I’m madly in love with you, Luce. I just need you to know that. I’m not great with art and words like you are, so I can’t even tell you how much you mean to me. But it’s the world, Luce. You mean the world to me.
Obviously I wanted to do this in person, but there’s a ring in my pocket for you, Luce.

I hope you’ll accept it and be my wife. I’ll give anything for you to wear it. I’ll do anything. I’ll move to Detroit for you. Please be safe. Please be alive. I can’t bear the thought of you never knowing how I feel. I love you.
Wow, Brendan
I don’t know what to say
Say yes
Say you love me too
I’m just—wow
Sensory overload
I love you, I really do.
But is it okay if we table that proposal for now?
Yes, yes of course
You’re alive--that’s all I need.
Yeah, I’m alive
And I’m in the FRONT seat of an FBI agent’s car.
Front seat is definitely better than the back seat
Yeah. Her name is Dr. Claire Carnwright
She said she got a call from one of your dad’s business associates?
We called everyone we knew, Lucy
I did everything I could to keep you alive
Wow
I don’t know what to say—wow.
That’s a first 😉
Haha, I’d tell you to shut up and be supportive, but obviously, you are
You saved my life tonight.
Tell me what happened
Dr. Carnwright said they were investigating Topher for a while, because he’s been a major arms dealer on the black market.
Topher?! As in, your roommate Topher?
Yeah
The FBI got me out of the cell and then arrested him
He had three pistols on him.
Like, literally strapped to his body.
Holy shit
I know. Then Dr. Carnwright took my back to my apartment and showed me Topher’s room.
There had to be 40 guns in there, Brendan. All fully loaded.
And I’ve been living there, completely oblivious.
I just keep thinking… one bad customer, one argument…
Don’t even say it, Luce.
That’s seriously so fucked up.
Here’s the hard part, though
The reason we have to table the proposal
They offered to put me in the Witness Protection Program
A lot of people HAD been in and out of our apartment…
And I thought they were just friends Topher had made.
But they were really bad criminals.
And now they know my face.
So I think I have to take the FBI’s offer.
I’m going into Witness Protection.
I’ll go with you
Brendan, you can’t--
You’d have to leave your family and your friends—everyone you love
I wouldn’t have to leave you.
Luce, it’s okay if you don’t want to get engaged right now…
But I meant what I said
EVERYTHING I said
I want you to be my person
Brendan, look.
No. YOU look.
I love you. And I’ll sacrifice anything to keep you in my life.
I’m sorry, Brendan
But I can’t let you do that.
I love you too much
I’m giving away my phone soon
And know that I’m crying as I say this, but I want you to fall in love
Fall in love with someone wonderful
And normal
Lucy, no
Find someone who hasn’t been messed up from a fucked-up situation like this one
Everything that happened tonight has made me really cagey, Brendan
I mean, I found out I couldn’t even trust my best friend since kindergarten.
You don’t deserve someone like this.
You deserve someone great.
No, please Lucy
No
Goodbye, my love. Find someone great.
Wait, Lucy!
Please wait. Let me say my part.
1 minute later
Please? Give me a chance to say my part.
Dammit Lucy.
10 minutes later
Lucy, I will always love you. Compared to you, there’s no such thing as great.
Lucy and Brendan never saw each other again.
After years of therapy, Lucy decided to channel her fear into training, and she went on to join the FBI and repay her debt.
Brendan only fell in love once in his life.
No one compared to Lucy McMillan.
